ActCanada Labour Code
PrecisReappointment of RICHARD HORNUNG, Q.C., of Calgary, Alberta, as a part-time Vice-Chairperson of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective June 27, 2010.
